website_summaries.verdict: Only consider the Vitamix S30 if personal to-go blending and quality are your objectives and saving money isn't.
pros: The Vitamix S30 offers quality construction and design, blends for drinking on the go, and recipes galore
cons: The S30 is expensive, has blades that are tricky to clean by hand, and isn't as powerful as bigger all-purpose blenders

customer_reviews.title: great for a small kitchen
customer_reviews.text: To be honest this is not a good product for someone with a large family, but If you are single or have a very small kitchen this is perfect! I mostly use the 20 ounce container to go because I like to make smoothies. For making soups in small batches the 32 ounce container is great! I love my Vitamix! I use it every day!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Best of all blenders!
customer_reviews.text: The best blender EVER! We have the big one, and I just had to have this cute little (?) one for smoothies, and other quick things. To tell you the truth, if I had gotten this one first, I might not have bought the full-size. I like how this one can stay on the counter without getting in the way, There is NO comparison to Vitamix!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: This blender is great!! It's perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This blender is great!! It's perfect for my needs, doesn't take up much counter space and clean up is easy. Note: following the Vitamix instructions for loading items into the blender and everything blends up just fine. The unexpected bonus was the two 20 ounce to-go cups...very nice. I didn't realize I would be able to blend drinks in the cup. The blender base screws onto the cups and you put it on the base then blend. Also, the insulation on the cups are great, I put my cold drinks in with a bit of ice and it stays nice and cold. Overall, a very good purchase and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: KPorterInLA

customer_reviews.title: Lemon
customer_reviews.text: Worked great the first few months but have had to return it twice for repair and it still isn't chopping hard or frozen veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Style

customer_reviews.title: my first one was too big but awesome, however I use it 3 to 6x a ...
customer_reviews.text: got it refurbished coz its my 2nd vitamix, my first one was too big but awesome,however I use it 3 to 6x a day so I needed a small one for my small kitchen...this is perfect.....I hope it stays long with me
customer_reviews.author: Mata

customer_reviews.title: Will Last A Lifetime!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I find wrong with this is the staining of the plastic over time despite the rampant cleaning. That’s hardly worth not leaving a 5 star review, though. This product is still going as if it’s brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Coughlin

customer_reviews.title: Love my vitamix!
customer_reviews.text: what can I say, it's a vitamix! it just can't be beat! I don't really use the individual to go cup since i mostly drink them at home. I the other container is 48 oz but that's not really big enough if I want to make smoothie for all 3 of us because you can't actually fill it to 48 ozs. I wish this container was a little larger but it's perfect for making for just myself each morning! It's powerful and I love the spin dial. Nothing digital to try to read.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this blender, just make sure you screw bottom on tight or it will leak.
customer_reviews.author: Dawne Yankasky

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have a blender that can blend ice
customer_reviews.text: Took me a while to decide which blender to buy. Nice to have a blender that can blend ice, my old blender couldn't do that!
customer_reviews.author: Irla Landry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The design is so good. The engine is very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Chang

customer_reviews.title: Daily smoothies are now Easy Peasy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had always considered a Vitamix, well knowing it was an investment. After my Ninja broke down twice, I knew it was time to make that worthy investment. The S30 is perfect for me as I make daily smoothies and dont need to clean a big machine. I am also able to put in raw vegetables and get a smooth consistency, something I hadn't had in the Ninja. I am VERY pleased with my Vitamix!!!
customer_reviews.author: Candice Melwicks

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Blender
customer_reviews.text: I love this blender and use it almost every day. Easy to clean and can pop all but the blender blades in the dish washer. I would recommend it to anyone who likes a quick smoothie or other blended drink. Helps me stay healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki's List

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I found this to be a splurge item but SO worth it. I was paying $9 for a small smoothie at a local juice bar. I have friends that have the Ninja product but they all have said, "I really want a Vitamix" I'm glad I made the leap of faith and followed the old adage, "you get what you pay for."
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect personal size
customer_reviews.text: Blends beautifully and the individual containers are really secure. Most recipes won't fit in the small ones so you have to be careful how you divide them. sometimes the bottom is hard to get off the big one, but I've loved everything I've made in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Very easy to use and not too big for our kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: SpectacularSix

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I use my Vitamix every week. It started off as a smoothie thing but now I am really enjoying making home made almond milk. The single serving container is easy to clean and very convenient. Yes, it's expensive but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicola

customer_reviews.title: The best purchase I could have made!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! I love it! It's perfect for me. I'm a nurse and this is great for carrying to work!
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Bought this in preparation for surgery and has helped with ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in preparation for surgery and has helped with being able to eat well and conveniently prepare foods and shakes.
customer_reviews.author: JohnJohn

customer_reviews.title: I love this, I use it at least once a ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this, I use it at least once a day. The travel cup is so practical. Both containers are extremely easy to use and to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super fast delivery, product great. Couldn't have been a better experience.
customer_reviews.author: mint girl

customer_reviews.title: I'm satisfied how it works
customer_reviews.text: I'm satisfied how it works! But not the way it was posted here in Amazon!! Coz I'm expecting that will comply to International Electrica Standard which is "Auto Volt" and its to difficult to used here in other part of the world!!
customer_reviews.author: Rodelito Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am sure it works perfectly but I returned it due to the cost and got a Ninja instead
customer_reviews.author: mg

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is much much much bigger than I anticipated. We never use it.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Morda

customer_reviews.title: I love the blender but good luck replacing the container if ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the blender but good luck replacing the container if you need to. I only need the cover but I was told I cannot get the top without buying the whole container, even the Vitamin website doesn't sell it. A waste of money if you ask me. I would not buy the S series, get one of the bigger blender so its easier to find the parts you need to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Funread

customer_reviews.title: BOTTOM PART TOO TOUGH TO TAKE OFF
customer_reviews.text: Used for smoothies 2-3 times a week (if that). Could not get the bottom part off to clean. It’s almost impossible to unscrew. Even grown men cannot open the bottom (black part) from The plastic portion. Do not waste your money. My old Hamilton Beach blender worked better and it was $25!!! 😱😱😱
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome! Used to have another brand that left pulp, so glad we went this route, no pulp and easy cleanup. Use it mostly for smoothies but have made soup in the larger container works great. Comes with a large recipe book. Well worth the extra money!
customer_reviews.author: df

customer_reviews.title: Used everyday
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses it everyday. As a recovering cancer patient , he developed a problem that made it impossible to eat solid food (temporarily.) the Vitamix blender makes it easy for him to make nutrional drinks, shakes, and smoothies to keep up his strength. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Patty K

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I had a regular size Vitamin and loved it. I wanted something smaller sine I make smoothies every day. This is perfect, I LOVE IT. It is quite powerful and lives up to the Vitamin name.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Dillon

customer_reviews.title: This does not blend even the most basic smoothies. ...
customer_reviews.text: This does not blend even the most basic smoothies. Always have to put wayy too much liquid in. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: This blender is EVERYTHING! I use it primarily for Bulletproof Coffee but it's amazing for all uses...worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for daily use and very compact
customer_reviews.text: wife loves it. Excellent for daily use and very compact. We plan on taking it with us when we go camping this summer. So far it's working great.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Miles

customer_reviews.title: Not what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly what I was looking for. None of the recipes worked. A lot of the veg/fruit ended up in the cap. I sent mine back.
customer_reviews.author: R. Moore

customer_reviews.title: I love this machine
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine....It has honestly given me a renewed sense of health and well being inso much as a piece of equipment can. The true joy of owning this piece is the power and ease of use. Making healthy smoothies is not a chore. It's a great investment so long as you know that you will be using it often and not letting it collect cobwebs
customer_reviews.author: camilo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to the Vitamix family. Same excellent quallity. Got a seconod individual container so there is always one handy.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking, just get it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it but buy the larger one. You will realize how amazing it is and then want to upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Awesome

customer_reviews.title: sorry had to return, needed a larger one
customer_reviews.text: returned it for the larger size. needed one I could make my babies food. larger one is awesome
customer_reviews.author: candyB

customer_reviews.title: Turns Out I'm Not the Type
customer_reviews.text: I sent it back without trying it out, finding it too big (significantly bigger than the measurements given and, thus, my closet space.) I'm a minimalist and, looking through the recipe book, I didn't see anything i couldn't make with my immersion blender (at least that I wanted to make: except for nut butter, but you can buy a lot of nut butter for the price of this machine). I bought this on friends' effusive recommendations about its potential to simplify life. I'm sure it works beautifully, but do you need it?
customer_reviews.author: Chantal

product_meta.title: Vitamix S30 S-Series Blender, Professional-Grade, 40oz. Container, Black
product_meta.description: The Vitamix s30 is the only high performance personal blender that has the power and design to deliver a high-quality blend consistently on a wide range of blending recipes.
feature_bullets: 40-ounce compact container for small family meals
Easy-to-use Variable Speed Control and Pulse feature
Backed by a 5-year full warranty and 30-day guarantee

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars105 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
